abstracts.cdata!:
The proposed loan would assist in
            financing the first three years of RENFE's Five Year
            Plan (1971-75). The Loan will cover about 21 percent of the
            total cost of the project and finance mostly track
            rehabilitation and provision of motive power and rolling stock.
